## Software Carpentries
Software Carpentries workshops are offered in person over two-days, including breakfast, lunch, and snacks. Topics covered will depend on the specific workshop, but could include R, python, SQL, Unix, and more.  

### Introduction to Data Analysis in R
**When:** August 29-30, 2024, 9am-4pm\
**Where:** [HELIX](https://maps.app.goo.gl/3w96QNsCt9ASd3d77){target="_blank"} GS 150 (Chokecherry)\
**Instructors:** Rebecca Barter, George Vega Yon\
Contact [DELPHI](mailto:delphi@hsc.utah.edu) with any inquiries. [Register to save your spot!](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSe5AG948sVwBK9Y7c1YgYzWCd4b5JrMni1PMBOLIhpoMtI9EQ/viewform){target="_blank"}
